Author: callmyduck
Title: [ANN][Pre-SALE] HUNT.BET – eSports BlockChain Betting Platform
Body: So, the moment is here. This is a longread, and we really want you to read it.  https://i.imgur.com/2jXM3Tml.jpg  Let’s begin from the start of HUNT.BET Project. In the beginning we started to develop the product without understanding that we can move it to the blockchain and make an ICO with that. The goal was to steal a way to eSports audience hearts. Our team spent days and nights designing the system of our masterpiece. Every piece of the system was developed relying on cybersports audience opinion. We were collecting opinions of gamers, users of betting platforms and people who are interested in eSports and designed the HUNT.BET – project that meant to be loved by everyone.  So the plan was to develop the project, buy the license, make friendships with professional teams and media persons related to eSports and click on the “LAUNCH BUTTON”.  Then the ICO appeared. Thoughts that we can make our project on the blockchain and raise money to push our project to the world scene blowed our minds. We slowly started to “flow” through all moments, related to ICO. What should we do? What should we start with? Who do we need? How will we jump into this huge market? These and many other questions appeared on our way to actual launching. Our project is 70% complete – maybe it can give us a huge boost compared to other ICOs?  So, it happened. We found the answers and thought that everything is great – we can start the ICO. We made the crowdsale site, made our whitepaper, found money to make the PR campaign, found really good person who became our Bounty Campaign manager, made the topic on Bitcointalk forum and there we go – timer is launched, ICO is coming.  We did not publish any articles on news portals, did not make any ICO announcements on the ICO platforms. Our fault, we thought that we can do it later, nothing will change if we will do it at the time of ICO start or even in few days.  Only after that we realised that audience was not prepared for us – we just appeared from nowhere and started to sell our tokens. “Haste makes waste”, beautiful Russian proverb says.  First stage of our ICO ended and we weren’t funded a lot. For sure, it was a crash. But, we are not despaired by this. We want the world to know about us. HUNT.BET will live and we will do everything for it, but we need your help!  After few days, we decided to ask audience about our mistakes. Now we really want to be fully open to you, your questions and your thoughts. We want to make the second ICO stage as perfect as it can be. Now, we have an audience and this is a perfect moment to start the preparation for it.  So, we appeal to you. We made a vote and we really need your thoughts. There are just few variants – it won’t take a lot of time.  Stay with us and join our story – we will show the world that we can do it!  VOTE LINK Original article  Best regards, HUNT.BET Team.

Author: callmyduck
Title: [ANN][Pre-SALE] HUNT.BET – eSports BlockChain Betting Platform
Body: Hello! Yes, you are absolutely right.  Now we are collecting the feedback and analyzing everything that we've done wrong. So, we will post the vote results in the near future (I think, tomorrow) and from that point, we will start to change the project relying on the needs of the community.   So, we really want you to help us. And we are asking you to tell us your personal opinion. What have we done wrong? One of the main mistakes is that we haven't worked with a community in the way we should. From now, we really want you guys to make this project huge. Without you, everything is a trash.

Title: [ANN][Pre-SALE] HUNT.BET – eSports BlockChain Betting Platform

I am also suggesting to establish linkages with those that can really help the project. Maybe also get some more people to be a part of the team even as advisers. This project has a good potential to make it...maybe it just need some little tweaking.

Author: Ccexicocartel
Title: [ANN][Pre-SALE] HUNT.BET – eSports BlockChain Betting Platform
Body: I remain skeptical...when I look at ICO's, I look at founders, team, proof of concept, and ultimately the idea. Their idea is the same as UnikoinGold, but UnikoinGold has more credibility with all of my criteria.  You can put together a great presentation, but you have to execute and deliver. I'm interested to see how this plays out.

Author: prehisto
Title: [ANN][Pre-SALE] HUNT.BET – eSports BlockChain Betting Platform
Body: Just realised that i will not be paid for social bounty, thats sad. This is my first experience when ICO does not work out.  I think that they made marketing mistakes along the road. The idea is solid and popular, if you are tying to restart this. I would recommend to give more attention to bounties and other marketing prior the token sale, spread the word!

Author: callmyduck
Title: [ANN][Pre-SALE] HUNT.BET – eSports BlockChain Betting Platform
Body: Yeah, we planned to pay all the bounty in ETH, but we weren't founded a lot – so fees for transactions were more expensive than we had for the bounty. We've made our conclusion – payments for bounty campaign in the second round of ICO will be for sure in tokens and maybe in ETH too as a bonus. We are not disappointed – we are continuing to work on our project, so be tuned to be first who will catch the upcoming news!  Quote from: Ccexicocartel on October 07, 2017, 12:58:32 AM I remain skeptical...when I look at ICO's, I look at founders, team, proof of concept, and ultimately the idea. Their idea is the same as UnikoinGold, but UnikoinGold has more credibility with all of my criteria.  You can put together a great presentation, but you have to execute and deliver. I'm interested to see how this plays out.  Yeah, we saw that the Unikrn started their ICO and was founded successfully – we are not the same. They are just the betting platform, but, as you can see, we are willing to build the whole infrastructure that will connect all our project to all the features that we have in eSports world now. We are searching for good partnerships now – just wait for it.
